alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 12:23PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane affecting Lyon County. .Snow melt and reservoir releases will cause the river flows to remain high. Runoff of rain from thunderstorms into tributaries above Mason could exacerbate river flows. For the Mainstem Walker River...including PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz, Schurz, Mason at Snyder Lane...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.3 feet, Moderate flooding of lowlands to farm and pasture lands throughout the Mason Valley-Yerington area. Some low structures adjacent to river begin to flood. Several secondary and some primary roads flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:05 PM PDT Monday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:05 PM PDT Monday was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to climb slowly to above flood stage near 11.3 feet by midweek. - Flood stage is 9.8 feet. - https://www.cnrfc.noaa.gov http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Mason Bridge and Miller Lane are closed. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday.
